tools.title: nvd_feed_api
tools.description: A simple ruby API/library for managing NVD CVE feeds. The API will help you to download and manage NVD Data Feeds, search for CVEs, build your vulnerability assessment platform or vulnerability database.

tools.title: Flask Session Cookie Decoder/Encoder
tools.description: A simple python script that let you encode and decode a Flask session cookie.

tools.title: RABID
tools.description: A CLI tool and library allowing to simply decode all kind of BigIP cookies.

tools.title: ctf-party
tools.description: A library to enhance and speed up script/exploit writing for CTF players (or security researchers, bug bounty hunters, pentesters but mostly focused on CTF) by patching the String class to add a short syntax of usual code patterns.

tools.title: itdis
tools.description: Is a small tool that allows you to check if a list of domains you have been provided is in the scope of your pentest or not.

tools.title: PixelChart
tools.description: Map binary data into a beautiful chart.

tools.title: VBSmin
tools.description: VBScript minifier CLI tool and library

tools.title: Pass Station
tools.description: CLI & library to search for default credentials among thousands of Products / Vendors.

tools.title: vrt-cli
tools.description: A simple tool to visualize VRT (Vulnerability Rating Taxonomy) from the CLI.

tools.title: TLS map
tools.description: CLI & library for mapping TLS cipher algorithm names: IANA, OpenSSL, GnuTLS, NSS.

tools.title: BQM
tools.description: Deduplicate custom BloudHound queries from different datasets and merge them in one customqueries.json file.

tools.title: DC Detector
tools.description: Spot all domain controllers in a Microsoft Active Directory environment. Find computer name, FQDN, and IP address(es) of all DCs.

tools.title: miniss
tools.description: Displays a list of open listening sockets. It is a minimal alternative to ss or netstat to offer a static binary that can be deployed on containers or hardened environnement where the classical binaries have been removed.

tools.title: kh2hc
tools.description: Convert OpenSSH known_hosts file hashed with HashKnownHosts to hashes crackable by Hashcat.

tools.title: unisec
tools.description: A CLI tool and library to play with Unicode security.

tools.title: hivexcavator
tools.description: Extracting the contents of Microsoft Windows Registry (hive) and display it as a colorful tree but mainly focused on parsing BCD files to extract WIM files path for PXE attacks.

tools.title: AspiSec
tools.description: Vacuuming out the remnants of offensive tools. AspiSec is responsible for removing the traces and confidential information left by offensive security tools on an auditor's computer in various cache and log files.
